description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget for the 'Now Playing' screen in a music streaming app. It displays current track information, playback controls, and integrates with the PlaybackService for controlling and observing playback state.

classes.name: NowPlayingScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that represents the 'Now Playing' screen, showing track details and playback controls.

classes.description: State class managing the playback state, user interactions, and UI updates for the 'Now Playing' screen.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the playback service, seeds a sample track, and sets up listeners for playback state changes.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes resources associated with the playback service when the widget is removed.
